sentences.english: Encouragement also needs to be regular- don't be stingy with your encouragement.
sentences.chinese: 也需要經常鼓勵他人，不要吝惜。

sentences.english: No regatea el dinero para la educación de sus hijos.
sentences.chinese: 爲了子女的教育他不吝惜金錢。

sentences.english: My beautiful plume is the pride of my birth, but I never use it niggardly .
sentences.chinese: 我絢麗的羽衣是我天生的驕傲，但我從不吝惜使用。

sentences.english: They did not begrudge the money spent on their child's education.
sentences.chinese: 他們不吝惜把錢花在孩子受教育上。
這樣的交流，誰還會吝惜呢？

sentences.english: She never stints herself of money to buy books for her children.
sentences.chinese: 她從不吝惜掏錢讓子女們買書。

sentences.english: Don't stint on time to make a plan.
sentences.chinese: 在制定計劃上不要吝惜時間，多想一想好。

sentences.english: He grudged his horse the grass it ate.
sentences.chinese: 他連他的馬喫的草料都吝惜。

sentences.english: All the gifts of physical beauty have been lavished on it.
sentences.chinese: 它不吝惜在大地上展現一切身體美感的稟賦。

sentences.english: He is unsparing of his own peace and comfort.
sentences.chinese: 他不吝惜自己的安逸舒適。

sentences.english: Of course, this shouldn't be an excuse to skimp on your lady's gift.
sentences.chinese: 當然，這並不應該成爲吝惜給心愛的人買禮物的藉口。

sentences.english: So I never grudge my love.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我從不吝惜我的愛。

sentences.english: He coveteth greedily all the day long: but the righteous giveth and spareth not.
sentences.chinese: 有終日貪得無厭的，義人施捨而不吝惜。

definition: not to stint/to be generous (with praise etc)/to be prepared to (pay a fee, give of one's time etc)
to relent (to spare sb's feelings)/to show mercy or forgiveness/to forbear/lenient
to care about/equivalent of 在於|在于[zai4 yu2]
to be willing to part with sth
to care about/to take offense/to mind
to feel grateful to sb/to appreciate the kindness
